alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:54AM MST until January 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will occur. For those planning to outdoor recreation prepare for cold and snowy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell
